Installing Packages 

```{r}
install.packages("bibliometrix", dependencies=TRUE) 
install.packages("XML")
```
.bib 

```{r}
library(bibliometrix)

data_bib <- readFiles("Test_File.bib")
datadf_bib <- convert2df(data_bib, dbsource = "isi", format = "bibtex")

```
